meta.title: Construction Portfolio | Residential & Commercial Support
meta.description: Construction portfolio featuring drywall, framing, insulation, finishing, and site administration work across residential and commercial projects in Canada.
meta.ogDescription: Hands-on field execution and reliable administrative support for construction projects.

home.headline: Reliable Construction Support from Site to Office
home.summary: I support residential and light commercial builds with practical field work and organized site administration, from framing and drywall prep to material tracking and daily reporting.

items.title: Basement Renovation - Toronto, ON
items.description: Supported framing layout, insulation installation, drywall boarding, and finishing prep for a full basement conversion.

items.title: Retail Interior Refresh - Mississauga, ON
items.description: Coordinated demolition cleanup, partition wall framing, drywall repairs, and closeout documentation under tight timelines.

items.title: Townhome Multi-Unit Finishing - Vaughan, ON
items.description: Tracked materials, assisted with punch list completion, and supported schedule updates between subcontractors and site supervision.
